originalText.text: Dr. Mitchel is simply the best doctor I've encountered for my health care ; he's knowledgable he shows empathy, he's patient  and he listens  best diagnostic doctor I've ever encountered  in my 74 years!

text.text: Dr. Mitchel is simply the best doctor I've encountered for my health care ; he's knowledgable he shows empathy, he's patient  and he listens  best diagnostic doctor I've ever encountered  in my 74 years!

originalText.text: Fairly new to the practice but one negative aspect is repeated calls for the same issues. I don't know if the staff can't take a proper message or Dr. Mitchell prioritizes what he deems requires immediate attention but calling 2-3 times to ask for the same thing is leaving a very bad taste in my mouth especially because its for meds. Ridiculous!

text.text: Fairly new to the practice but one negative aspect is repeated calls for the same issues. I don't know if the staff can't take a proper message or Dr. Mitchell prioritizes what he deems requires immediate attention but calling 2-3 times to ask for the same thing is leaving a very bad taste in my mouth especially because its for meds. Ridiculous!

originalText.text: The best doctor ever. Very clean and spacious waiting room. Dr Mitchell is very cautious when it comes to infections control and washes his hands every time before and after. There’s no rush when sitting in his office and he listens to any and every concern, even after my session is over and I forgot to mention something I can always turn back and he’s there again to listen. He makes us feel comfortable and you get that feeling that you just want to sit in his office for a longer period of time because of how comfortable we feel each time. Every medical problem I have my doctor solved each time.

originalText.text: Great medical doctor he's my wife family doctor so I started going to him. love this guy.
